content: This stream is for Inferno Announcements (tech talk notices, etc).
We also have a google group for announcements, if you don't visit chat.fhir.org often: https://groups.google.com/g/inferno-testing

We'll be holding our monthly Tech Talk Wed, Aug 12, 2020 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM (ET) to discuss updates to the Inferno testing tool and to cover any special topics of interest to the community.

https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/774619365
United States: +1 (646) 749-3122
Access Code: 774-619-365

We'll be holding our monthly Tech Talk Wed, September 9, 2020 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM (ET) to discuss updates to the Inferno Program Edition in version 1.2. In this talk, we will also discuss Inferno's participation in the Argonaut US Core track at the upcoming HL7 Connectathon.

https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/774619365
United States: +1 (646) 749-3122
Access Code: 774-619-365
